search.title: Search
search.error: No result. Maybe instance is down ? Try to change Invidious instance from settings screen.

search.emptyValue: You can't search with empty value

empty.favorisNotSet: Your favoris playlist is not set.

settings.title: Settings
settings.importExportText: Export or import my playlists and my favoris

addToPlaylist.title: Add to playlist
addToPlaylist.text: Select the playlist to which you want to add your music

editToken.title: Edit Invidious token
With an empty token, you will switch to logout mode

monitoring.title: Monitoring
monitoring.text1: HoloPlay includes an error and performance monitoring tool that is disabled by default. No data is retrieved without your consent
monitoring.text2: By activating it, any errors will be sent to a self-hosted instance of Sentry
monitoring.label: Enable

flashMessage.invidiousInstanceUpdated: Invidious instance and playlist are updated
flashMessage.invidiousInstanceTokenUpdated: Invidious instance updated. Consider changing your token

flashMessage.dataExportSuccess: Your playlist and your favoris has been exported
flashMessage.dataExportError: Error : your data can not been exported. Pleas check the app permission
flashMessage.dataImportSuccess: Your playlist and your favoris has been imported
flashMessage.dataImportError: Error : your data can not been imported. Pleas check the app permission
